title: default Master password
extract: The Master Password. The Master password is used to authenticate the root account and protect the access to the keystore. By default, the master password is geoserver. If you forgot the master password, you can ask GeoServer to write it down in plain text to a file of your choice.
extract_html: The Master Password. The Master password is used to authenticate the root account and protect the access to the keystore. By default, the master password is geoserver. If you forgot the master password, you can ask GeoServer to write it down in plain text to a file of your choice.
